references: The executed agreement is filed as [Clerk File 312101](http://clerk.ci.seattle.wa.us/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=312101&s2=&s4=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CFCF1&Sect6=HITOFF&d=CFCF&p=1&u=/~public/cfcf1.htm&r=0&f=S)
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to indigent public defense services; authorizing the City Budget Director to execute a contract for secondary defender services; authorizing a structure with only two public defense service providers for an interim period until a third provider contract is executed; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and declaring an emergency to provide for restoration of a program of essential indigent public defense services delayed by litigation.
